name: Lead Account Data Scientist (Remote option)
description:
Neuton.ai – Automated Machine Learning platform developed by Bell Integrator. Neuton encapsulates best Data Science practices and provides a service of end-to-end machine learning for everybody.

Lead Account Data Scientist (LADS) is a critical role within the Neuton team, aimed at ensuring both customers success and appreciation while using the product. An ideal candidate will have a strong grasp of fundamentals in both applied data science and statistics, as applicable to business settings. The LADS is both comfortable solving complex data driven problems, and effectively communicating abstract mathematical concepts to customers.

Expectations

Hard skills:

  • 2-3 years in an applied data science role
  • Fluency with scripting (Python / R)
  • Hands-on experience with pandas, numpy, sklearn, matplotlib, seaborn, xgboost and R
  • Ability to independently perform complete machine learning projects including data cleaning/processing, EDA, hypothesis generation/testing, feature engineering, algorithm selection/tuning/validation, and generation of experiment reports
  • Knowledge of metrics definitions and differences, and metrics optimization techniques
  • Understanding of Logistic/Linear regression, Decision Trees/Random Forest/Boosted Trees/ neural networks frameworks
  • Ability to explain strong and weak points of the above algorithms’ applications
  • Strong knowledge of Statistics

Soft skills:

  • Fluent in English
  • Exceptional verbal communication, writing and interpersonal skills
  • Readiness to work as needed, across both Russian and US time zones.
  • Strong record of successful and positive interactions with customers
  • Strong project management skills
  • Readiness to relocate to the US office

Good to have:

  • Familiarity with BigData, Hadoop, CUDA

We offer:

  • Competitive compensation & benefits package
  • Work with newest algorithms, NN frameworks
  • Development of AutoML platform
  • Participation in the TOP DS community events
  • Ability to relocate to US
